problem.markdown:
Refer A-03 from Exercises Set A. What are the major modes of work interaction that take place in the system according to the data provided?
[x] Expansion mode [ ] Electric mode [ ] Magnetic mode [x] Stirrer mode
[explanation] According to the data available in A-03, there is no indication of any electric or magnetic mode of work interaction. [explanation]
problem.p: Refer A-03 from Exercises Set A.
What are the major modes of work interaction that take place in the system according to the data provided?

div.p: According to the data available in A-03, there is no indication of any electric or magnetic mode of work interaction.
